I.name: Petricite Burst
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Sylas' ''' ability casts generate a stack of ''Unshackled'' lasting 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 3 times. While '''Sylas''' has stacks, he gains {{as|{{sti|125% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Unshackled:}} '''Sylas' '''next [[basic attack]] consumes a stack to whirl his chains around him, which has an {{tip|uncancellable windup}} and deals {{as|130% AD}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to the primary target and {{as|40% AD}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies.
Damage to secondary targets executes {{tip|minions}} that would be left {{as|below 25 health}}.
''The empowered attack applies [[on-hit effect]]s to the primary target but disables {{tip|critical strike}} '''bonus''' damage. [[Spell effects]] only apply to secondary targets.''
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Sylas' ability casts generate a stack of Unshackled lasting 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 3 times. While Sylas has stacks, he gains 125% bonus attack speed.
Innate - Unshackled: Sylas' next basic attack consumes a stack to whirl his chains around him, which has an uncancellable windup and deals 130% AD (+ 25% AP) magic damage to the primary target and 40% AD (+ 20% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
Damage to secondary targets executes minions that would be left below 25 health.
The empowered attack applies on-hit effects to the primary target but disables critical strike bonus damage. Spell effects only apply to secondary targets.
I.notes:
* {{tip|Spellblade}} damage does not get converted to magic damage, and will deal its damage only to the primary target.
* ''Petricite Burst'' attacks do not add stacks of {{ri|Press the Attack}} to the target.
* ''Petricite Burst'' attacks do not apply {{stil|life steal}}.
* ''Petricite Burst'' attacks can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, but deal no increased damage when they do.
* ''Petricite Burst'' can be {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, {{tip|block|blocked}}, or missed while '''Sylas''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} as the primary target but not as a secondary target.

Q.name: Chain Lash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' lashes out two chains that converge to the target location and extend beyond it up to a maximum range, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
After a {{fd|0.6}}-second delay, the chains' intersection explodes to deal {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within, reduced by 60% against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
''Chain Lash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sylas lashes out two chains that converge to the target location and extend beyond it up to a maximum range, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and slowing them for 1.5 seconds.
After a 0.6-second delay, the chains' intersection explodes to deal magic damage to enemies within, reduced by 60% against minions and monsters.
Chain Lash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
leveling:
{{st|Detonation Damage|{{ap|70 to 290}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Non-Champion Detonation Damage|{{ap|70*0.4 to 290*0.4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|90*0.4}}% AP)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Champion Damage|{{ap|40+70 to 120+290}} {{as|(+ {{ap|90+40}}% AP)}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|40+70*0.4 to 120+290*0.4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|40+90*0.4}}% AP)}}}}
Q.notes: * The detonation's effect radius center is placed at the intersection between the chains from the initial cast, meaning a max range cast can create a detonation that reaches further than the chains do.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)
  • Slow: %

• Detonation Damage: (+ 90% AP)
  • Non-Champion Detonation Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Maximum Champion Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Maximum Non-Champion Damage: (+ % AP)

W.name: Kingslayer
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' {{tip|dashes}} to the front of the target enemy's location and strikes them to deal {{as|magic damage}}.

If this damages a {{tip|champion}}, '''Sylas''' is also {{tip|heal|healed}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|type='''Sylas'''' '''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 100 for 11|key1=%|0 to 60|formula=1% per 0.6% of Sylas' '''missing''' health}}|health}}.
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sylas dashes to the front of the target enemy's location and strikes them to deal magic damage.
If this damages a champion, Sylas is also healed, increased by 0 to 60 ‒ undefined.
W.notes:
* The damage will be dealt if the dash completed uninterrupted, and regardless of how far the target's location is at the end of the dash.
** '''Sylas''' will heal even if the target champion dies before the dash is completed. 
** The only exception is if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, in which case ''Kingslayer'' will have no effect.
* Despite being single target, ''Kingslayer'' does not draw minion aggro.{{bug}}

effects.str:
• Heal: (+ 40% AP)
  • Maximum Heal: (+ % AP)

E1.name: Abscond
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location. Within {{fd|3.5}} seconds, he can cast ''{{ai|Abduct|Sylas}}'' after a {{tt|{{fd|0.2}}-second delay|Starts on-cast, not after completing the dash}} from casting ''Abscond''.
''Abscond will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
E1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sylas dashes to the target location. Within 3.5 seconds, he can cast Sylas's Abduct after a 0.2-second delay from casting Abscond.
Abscond will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

E2.name: Abduct
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' whips out his chains in the target direction that deal {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit, {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.5}} seconds. He will then {{tip|dash}} towards their location and {{tip|airborne|knock them up}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds upon arrival.
'''''Sylas''' is {{tip|lockout|unable}} to cast {{ai|Chain Lash|Sylas}} while the chains are in flight.''
E2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sylas whips out his chains in the target direction that deal magic damage to the first enemy hit, revealing and stunning them for 0.5 seconds. He will then dash towards their location and knock them up for 0.5 seconds upon arrival.
Sylas is unable to cast Sylas's Chain Lash while the chains are in flight.
E2.notes:
*''Abduct'' counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* '''Sylas''' will not dash to his target if the chains are blocked by {{tip|spell shield}}.
* The target will be revealed for 2 seconds if the dash is interrupted.
* ''Abduct'' will still apply the {{tip|airborne|knock up}} if the target is {{tip|untargetable}} by the end of the dash.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* '''Sylas''' is unable to perform actions while dashing to the target, and becomes able to again after {{fd|0.05}} seconds of the dash ending.
* '''Sylas''' will not dash to the target hit if he is {{tip|channel|channeling}} or {{tip|dash|dashing}} from a {{ai|Hijack|Sylas|Hijacked}} ability.
** The exception is {{cai|Ace in the Hole|Caitlyn}}, where the channel is cancelled and '''Sylas''' is pulled to his target.

R.name: Hijack
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' launches his chains at the target enemy champion, gaining a copy of their [[champion ability|ultimate ability]] upon arrival and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|0.825}} seconds at the start of the cast time. '''Sylas''' cannot select the same champion again for a set duration, and can hold the ''hijacked'' ultimate for 90 seconds, during which he can recast ''Hijack''.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Sylas''' casts his hijacked ultimate ability at no cost, scaling based on ''Hijack's'' rank and his own [[Champion statistic|statistics]].

''Hijacked'' ultimates and abilities that do not scale with {{as|{{sti|ability power}}}} have their {{as|{{sti|attack damage}}}} ratios converted to {{as|ability power}} ratios, scaling with {{as|{{fd|0.6}}% AP}} per {{as|1% '''total''' AD}}, and {{as|{{fd|0.4}}% AP}} per {{as|1% '''bonus''' AD}} respectively.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sylas launches his chains at the target enemy champion, gaining a copy of their champion ability upon arrival and revealing them for 0.825 seconds at the start of the cast time. Sylas cannot select the same champion again for a set duration, and can hold the hijacked ultimate for 90 seconds, during which he can recast Hijack.
Recast: Sylas casts his hijacked ultimate ability at no cost, scaling based on Hijack's rank and his own Champion statistic.
Hijacked ultimates and abilities that do not scale with ability power have their attack damage ratios converted to ability power ratios, scaling with 0.6% AP per 1% total AD, and 0.4% AP per 1% bonus AD respectively.
R.notes:
*  ''{{ai|Petricite Burst|Sylas}}'s'' stack from casting ''Hijack'' is given after '''Sylas''' receives the Hijacked ability.
* ''Hijack'''s per target cooldown is indicated by a ring under recently targetted enemy champions, and is only visible to '''Sylas''' and each individual enemy. 
* If '''Sylas''' casts ''Hijack'' on a {{tip|clone}}, no ultimate is stolen and the ability will be placed on full cooldown.
** The same does not occur for champions within a {{tip|zombie state}}.
* {{tip|clone|Clones}} do not copy ''Hijack's'' target cooldown indicator, potentially revealing them to '''Sylas'''. 
** {{cai|Inherent Glamour|Neeko}} does not hide her personal cooldown indicator, nor does she copy her allies'. 
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}** If the same happens when casting an on-target stolen ability, the ability will instead cancel and go on cooldown.
* If ''Hijack'' is intercepted by {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}}, '''Sylas''' will gain a copy of {{ai|R|Braum}} instead and an on-target cooldown will be applied to him.
** If {{ci|Braum}} has an on-target cooldown on him (by being previously ''Hijacked'') upon interception, no ultimate will be stolen.
* Since the copied ability scales based on ''Hijack's'' rank, abilities can be copied regardless of their rank.
* ''Hijack'' will copy all components of the ability: their passives and actives as well as recast effects. ''Hijack'' will not trigger the effects of other abilities unless absolutely necessary. 
* Shape-shifting ultimates will transform '''Sylas''' into the target's alternate form, replacing his basic abilities and '''base''' stats. Namely: {{ai|Aspect of the Cougar|Nidalee|Cougar Form}}, {{ai|Spider Form|Elise}}, {{ai|Transform Mercury Cannon|Jayce|Cannon Form}} and {{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}.
** ''Dragon's Descent'' transforms '''Sylas'''' {{tip|mana}}, into ''Shyvana's'' {{tip|fury}}, being able to replenishing it by basic attacking. At the end of the effect, '''Sylas''' gains his previous mana. 
** ''Dragon's Descent'' does not refresh ability cooldowns upon transforming. 
** ''Spider Form'' freezes Sylas' original cooldowns on their current values, causing them to not come off cooldown during Spider Form. {{bug}}
** Upon transforming back from {{ai|Transform Mercury Cannon|Jayce|Cannon Form}}, Sylas' next basic attack deals {{ai|Transform Mercury Hammer|Jayce|Transform Mercury Hammer}}'s bonus magic damage and uses his critical strike animation. 
** Transforming into ''Cougar Form'' with more than 2 stacks of Unshackled and then casting {{ai|Takedown|Nidalee|Takedown}} will disable Takedown's effect until the buff timer runs out. {{bug}}
** Permanent transformations last for ~5 minutes or until toggled off. 
** The alternate abilities of transforming champions will cost mana and scale with the ranks as appropriate for the ability (e.g. ranks in R for Nidalee and ranks in Q/W/E for Jayce/Elise).
** Upon transforming, a {{ai|Petricite Burst|Sylas}} stack will be deducted.
** {{ai|Petricite Burst|Sylas}} stacks will still be gained from abilities cast in alternate forms, but the stacks are gained independently from the normal ones.
*** If '''Sylas''' has both normal and transformed stacks, ''Petricite Burst'' will prioritize consuming '''Sylas''' stacks before the transformed ones.
* Ultimates comply with {{tip|One for All}} rules if an ally is playing the hijacked champion. For example, an allied {{cai|Hemorrhage|Darius}} stacks will increase the damage of the hijacked {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}}; or an allied {{cai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} will add extra damage to hijacked {{ai|Unleashed Power|Syndra}} as well as producing 3 spheres that she can use.
;Ultimate Interactions
* {{cai|Spirit Rush|Ahri}} - Does not gain {{ais|Essence Theft|Ahri}} takedown effect thus cannot grant additional recasts.
* {{cai|Comeuppance|Akshan}} - '''Sylas''' can cast {{ai|Abscond|Sylas}}, but doing so ends the channel prematurely. If '''Comeuppance''' is cast after {{ai|Abduct|Sylas}} but before the chains hit a target, '''Sylas''' isn't pulled to the target and the channel continues as usual. 
* {{cai|Curse of the Sad Mummy|Amumu}} - Does not apply {{ai|Cursed Touch|Amumu}}.
* {{cai|Moonlight Vigil|Aphelios}} - Based on the {{ai|The Hitman and the Seer|Aphelios|main weapon}} at the moment of steal. 
** {{ai|Crescendum|Aphelios}} empowers his basic attacks temporarily.
** {{ai|Calibrum|Aphelios}} does not apply marks.
** {{ai|Severum|Aphelios}} grants a shield if healed while at full health.
* {{cai|Enchanted Crystal Arrow|Ashe}} - Does not apply {{ai|Frost Shot|Ashe}} to secondary targets. 
* {{cai|Pyroclasm|Brand}} - Does not apply stacks of {{ai|Blaze|Brand}}.
* {{cai|Feast|Cho'Gath}} - Gains permanent ''Feast'' stacks on-kill.
* {{cai|Missile Barrage|Corki}} - Gains max charges. 
* {{cai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}} - Does not apply a stack of {{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius}}. Upon gaining a reset from a Rank 3 ''Noxian Guillotine'', '''Sylas''' can hold onto the spell for up to 300 seconds. 
* {{cai|Grand Challenge|Fiora}} - Gains {{as|movement speed}} in the effect and can trigger the area healing, but {{ai|Duelist's Dance|Fiora|Vitals}} do not deal bonus damage.
* {{cai|Hero's Entrance|Galio}} - Gives '''Sylas''' and allies {{ai|Shield of Durand 2|Galio|Shield of Durand's}} magic {{tip|shield}}, based on {{ai|Kingslayer|Sylas}} rank.
* {{cai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}} - Does not steal cannon upgrades.
* {{cai|GNAR!|Gnar}} - Gains a usable ultimate regardless of cast on {{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar}} or {{ci|Mega Gnar}}.
* {{cai|Needlework|Gwen}} - Does not apply {{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen}}. Recasts can be obtained by hitting any of '''Sylas''' abilities.  
* {{cai|UPGRADE!!!|Heimerdinger}} - '''Sylas's''' basic abilities are replaced with ''Heimerdinger's'' empowered abilities. The upgrade buff lasts until the ultimate can be stolen again.
* {{cai|Leap of Faith|Illaoi}} - Does not reduce {{sti|cooldown}} of {{ai|Kingslayer|Sylas}}.
* {{cai|Vanguard's Edge|Irelia}} - Applies marks of {{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}}.
* {{cai|Grandmaster's Might|Jax}} - Applies magic damage on-hit while holding onto '''Grandmaster's Might''', this effect is lost upon activation. 
* {{cai|Riftwalk|Kassadin}} - Only provides one use.
* {{cai|Killer Instinct|Kai'Sa}} - '''Sylas'''' basic attacks, {{ai|Abduct|Sylas}} and nearby allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizations}} apply stacks of {{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Plasma}}, up to 4. '''Sylas''' is unable to apply the 5th stack necessary to expunge the stacks.
* {{cai|Fate's Call|Kalista}} - Only castable with a {{ii|Black Spear|link}} (purchasable in the [[Shop]] for {{g|0 gold}}).
* {{cai|Mantra|Karma}} - '''Sylas'''' basic abilities are replaced with ''Karma's'' empowered abilities, according to '''Sylas'''' own ability ranks (including ''Hijack'' for Mantra bonuses).
* {{cai|Death Lotus|Katarina}} - Can be cast without a target. 
* {{cai|Umbral Trespass|Kayn}} - Based on current form ({{ci|Shadow Assassin}} / {{ci|Rhaast}}).
* {{cai|Void Assault|Kha'Zix}} - Can steal the ability's {{ai|Evolved Adaptive Cloaking|Kha'Zix|evolution}} bonus effects.
* {{cai|Slicing Maelstrom|Kennen}} - Applies {{ai|Mark of the Storm|Kennen}}.
* {{cai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!|Kled}} - Does not need {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|mount}} to cast.
* {{cai|Living Artillery|Kog'Maw}} - Only provides one use.
* {{cai|Mimic|LeBlanc}} - Uses the empowered version of {{ci|LeBlanc|LeBlanc's}} last cast basic ability. {{ai|Mimic Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}} does not apply its mark. If she has not cast any spells, {{ai|Mimic Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}} is copied. 
* {{cai|Solar Flare|Leona}} - Does not apply {{ai|Sunlight|Leona}}.
* {{cai|Lilting Lullaby|Lillia}} - '''Sylas'''' abilities apply {{ais|Dream-Laden Bough|Lillia}} debuff, which does not deal its damage over time.
* {{cai|The Culling|Lucian}} - Can cast {{ai|Abscond|Sylas}} and {{ai|Abduct|Sylas}} freely during the channel. 
* {{cai|Final Spark|Lux}} - Does not apply {{ai|Illumination|Lux}}.
* {{cai|Highlander|Master Yi}} - {{tip|takedown|Takedowns}} reduce basic ability cooldowns while holding onto ''Highlander'', this effect is lost upon activation.
* {{cai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}} - Can join the ''dimension'' of outgoing realms if cast in the proper range ''(does not extend their duration)''.
* {{cai|Fury of the Sands|Nasus}} - Does not reduce {{sti|cooldown}} of {{ai|Chain Lash|Sylas}}.
* {{cai|Inherent Glamour|Neeko}} - Always steals {{ai|Pop Blossom|Neeko}}, regardless of the champion Neeko is disguised as.
* {{cai|Ragnarok|Olaf}} - Does not grant {{as|AD}} based on '''Sylas'''' {{as|AP}}, despite the tooltip indicating so. 
* {{cai|Command: Shockwave|Orianna}} - Cast on self without a {{ai|Clockwork Windup|Orianna|Ball}}.
* {{cai|Grand Starfall|Pantheon}} - The spear deals damage based on {{ai|Chain Lash|Sylas}} rank and scales with {{as|46% AP}}. 
* {{cai|Behind Enemy Lines|Quinn}} - Does not cast {{ai|Skystrike|Quinn}} upon attacking an enemy champion. It can be casted manually however. 
* {{cai|Thrill of the Hunt|Rengar}} - '''Sylas''' will gain {{ai|Unseen Predator|Rengar}} on his next attack.
* {{cai|Dominus|Renekton}} - Grants '''Sylas''' {{as|20 mana}} on cast and then {{as|5 mana}} per second (up to {{as|75 total mana}} over the duration).
* {{cai|Void Rush|Rek'Sai}} - '''Sylas'''' attacks against enemy champions will apply a {{ai|Void Rush Mark|Rek'Sai|mark}} which can be used to cast the ability.
* {{cai|Blade of the Exile|Riven}} - Grants {{as|AD}} based on '''Sylas'''' {{as|AP}} on cast. 
* {{cai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} - Can use without a {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Grade}}.
* {{cai|Encore|Seraphine}} - Allies do not gain {{ai|Stage Presence|Seraphine|Notes}}.
* {{cai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana}} - Has a 200 second base cooldown.
* {{cai|Impale|Skarner}} - Can freely cast abilities during the suppression, but cannot basic attack or {{si|Flash}}. 
* {{cai|Hijack|Sylas}} - Steals the ability that the enemy '''Sylas''' has stolen. Cannot be targeted if no ability has been stolen.
* {{cai|Unleashed Power|Syndra}} - Throws a minimum of 3 {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra|spheres}}, which are left on the ground afterwards and vanish after 6 seconds.
* {{cai|Shadow Assault|Talon}} - Does not apply {{ai|Blade's End|Talon}}.
* {{cai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} - ''Sylas''' basic attacks apply {{ai|An Acquired Taste|Tahm Kench}}, allowing him to cast ''Devour'' on enemies.
* {{cai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}} - Gains max charges.
* {{cai|Buster Shot|Tristana}} - Always has 525 cast range as '''Sylas''' does not benefit from {{ais|Draw a Bead|Tristana}} per-level cast range increase.
* {{cai|Spray and Pray|Twitch}} - Gains 300 attack range and his attacks produce missiles that travel 850 range. These attacks are classified as {{tip|melee}}.
* {{ci|Udyr}} - Steals {{ai|Phoenix Stance|Udyr}}. Lasts for 2 empowered attacks, Sylas has up to 300 seconds to consume the empowered attacks. 
* {{cai|Fear Beyond Death|Urgot}} - Can cast {{ai|Kingslayer|Sylas}} during the recast. 
* {{cai|Chain of Corruption|Varus}} - Applies stacks of {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} to targets hit that can be detonated by '''Sylas'''' other abilities, dealing damage based on {{ai|Kingslayer|Sylas}} rank. 
* {{cai|Final Hour|Vayne}} - Gains the {{as|AD}} and {{as|MS}} bonuses. Additionally, '''Sylas''' gains {{tip|invisibility}} when he casts {{ai|Chain Lash|Sylas}}. 
* {{cai|Life Form Disintegration Ray|Vel'Koz}} - Does not apply {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz}}.
* {{cai|Sovereign's Domination|Viego}} - Always steals {{ai|Heartbreaker|Viego}}, regardless of the champion Viego is possessing.
* {{cai|Chaos Storm|Viktor}} - Can steal the ability's {{ai|Augment- Perfect Storm|Viktor|evolution}} bonus effects.
* {{cai|Featherstorm|Xayah}} - {{ai|Clean Cuts|Xayah|Feathers}} do not interact with an ally or enemy {{ci|Xayah}}.
* {{cai|Last Breath|Yasuo}} - {{tip|Critical strike|Critical strikes}} ignore 50% of the target's {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} after activation.
* {{cai|Final Chapter|Yuumi}} - Can freely cast abilities during the channel. 
* {{cai|Let's Bounce!|Zac}} - Cannot declare attacks nor use any abilities nor while bouncing. '''Sylas''' does not create {{ai|Cell Division|Zac|chunks}}.
* {{cai|Lightning Crash|Zeri}} - Can gain ''Overcharge's'' effects and refresh it on basic attacks (even without being charged) and abilities.
* {{cai|Death Mark|Zed}} - [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' does not mimic spells but can be reactivated to {{ai|Death Mark 2|Zed|swap}} places.
